name: Patricia C.
text: Always friendly staff, pizza done on time and done right. Special praise to Rusty the manager for already being outside when we pulled up for our take out. He's always on top of everything. Super friendly,  professional guy!

text: The food is never cooked properly and now they have no coupon discounts or special deals!!

name: Char Lynn
text: Really great at fast deliveries and never a disappointment

name: Earl Cook
text:
This pizza hut has a long history with me. As a single diget midget was involved with little league, birthdays, family outings.
Atmosphere a little different since remodel. But pizza is as I always remember ‚Ä¶More

name: Chelsea Whalen
text: I have been going here since I was a kid. The place has changed a lot, but the food is always good, and the couple of staff members who have been there since I was a kid are great. Cathy is our favorite waitress! She is always so nice and always on top of everything.

name: Les Benedict
text: Great service and tasty food.  Older style classic pizza hut with red brick. Great salad bar.  Can't miss for casual pizza or spaghetti and prices are great too.  Hope they don't turn this into a wing street otherwise it will lose it's character.  Had salad bar personal pizza and spaghetti.

name: Kevin Kerr
text: Fast, good food, good service.

name: Kyler Hathaway
text: The Honey BBQ Chicken sandwich is DIVINE. Most pizza huts dont have it but these guys do. So good!

name: James Carroll
text: Good food, made fast at reasonable prices...

name: Austin Sivesind
text: Great service, lots of parking, good food! Very pleasant staff .. Appreciated

text: Great service. Always quick and friendly waiters.

text: Love their veggie pizza. Decent salad bar.

name: Sarah Cudlipp
text: Pizza Hut is a great place for the whole family. They always have deals and specials going on! They are improving on their selections so that they are not just a pizza place and I am eager to see what the next additions to their menu is going to be! The staff is always friendly and will go out of their way to greet you.

text: They were pretty  fast with the service,pizzas were really good. Clean environment.

name: Trisha Chapman
text: We tried to place an order for delivery. Our current house is 2 miles from pizza hut and they would not deliver. Our old house is 7 miles away and they delivered there. They should probably reevaluate how they determine where they deliver. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jackie Otala
text: If I could give zero stars I would. I would appreciate the email that tells you what time your food will be delivered if it were at all accurate. We ordered food at 9:22pm, and the email told us that the food would be delivered at 10:05pm. ‚Ä¶More

name: Evan Jennings
